name: Fidget Spinner
description:
Fidget Spinner, the game you were all waiting for, yes, also you who are reading, I know that in the depths of your heart, you were waiting for a game like this!

This is a 2D game that will allow you to spin a lot of different spinners, each with its features. With the various upgrades that you can do going forward in the game, you will be able to spin your fidget spinner at the speed of light!

FEATURES
•30 Unlockable Spinners
•Speed Upgrade
